Name: La Vida Argentinian Steakhouse
Review Text: Liked the place, good Argentine food mainly steaks.. great ambience... Few chicken options mainly beef.

Name: La Vida Argentinian Steakhouse
Review Text: Great steak cooked to perfection. service was excellent and the d√©cor fits the steak House perfectly.

Name: La Vida Argentinian Steakhouse
Review Text: Nice place, reasonable prices, great food (restaurant is a little bit small and crowdly, but for sure worth to be visited).

Name: La Vida Argentinian Steakhouse
Review Text: I think we got a pork. The flavour is pork, we order sirloin steak but we got a white meat. I never see in my life a white sirloin steak.

Name: La Vida Argentinian Steakhouse
Review Text: Meat is good, but one has to keep in mind that no sides/sauces are included with your steak.

Name: La Vida Argentinian Steakhouse
Review Text: It's a small argentinian restaurant,but good food, friendly staff and a good atmosphere. I ate a steak and pommes, recommand.When I come to Amsterdam again,I'll eat there ;) E la senora fue muy amable,muchas gracias por todo.

Name: La Vida Argentinian Steakhouse
Review Text: Meat is ok. The rest is average. Service is average. Side, sauce and bread are all extras. I had the sensation to be ordering car options. Ice cream has both cherries and cookie on the menu picture, which are missing on the dish.

Name: La Vida Argentinian Steakhouse
Review Text: Very poor service. Appetisers arrived after main course. Sauces arrived after we had eaten. The mixed grill was very small with the lamb cutlet barely constructing a mouthful. ‚òπÔ∏è

Name: La Vida Argentinian Steakhouse
Review Text: The food was very delicious. All very well prepared, exquisite food. The waitress very kind, we loved the service and also the place. I recommend 100%

Name: La Vida Argentinian Steakhouse
Review Text: this restaurant is the best restaurant i have ever eaten there is very good wait staff and very good waiters and the food is very tasty it is the tastiest food i have ever eaten all go to this restaurant and enjoy it. this restaurant is worth 5 stars. give this restaurant all 5 stars

Name: La Vida Argentinian Steakhouse
Review Text: Great Steak, however my friend found a long hair in his.
